title.narrative: SoFiTV - Freedom of Expression journalism and Public Service in Somalia

description.narrative: The project to support Freedom of Expression journalism and Public Service in Somalia is aimed to help the poverty-ridden country in the efforts towards peaceful development and the rule of law. After the collapse of the Somali state and a long civil war t he people?s need for reliable information is immense. Somali media is fragmented and varied in reliability. The Ministry for Information is preparing a new Media Law and aims to develop Public Service Broadcasting within Somali National TV and Radio Mogadi shu. This project will move and install a modern TV studio from YLE Finland to SNTV in Mogadishu and train the staff for operation and maintenance. The project will also support the implementing of the Media Law by training legislators civil servants and s taff of the police and armed forces as well as journalists in good practices in the field. Together with the National Union of Somali Journalists the project will be training journalists in independent investigative journalism media ethics and safety meas ures.
